actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize construction of the project for Nonconnah Creek, Tenn. and Miss., and Horn Lake Creek, including Cowpen Creek, Tenn. and Miss.

summary.text: Authorizes construction of the projects for Nonconnah Creek and Horn Lake Creek, in Mississippi and Tennessee, at an estimated Federal cost of $57,800,000.

titles.title: A bill to authorize construction of the project for Nonconnah Creek, Tenn. and Miss., and Horn Lake Creek, including Cowpen Creek, Tenn. and Miss.
